mapper.select: SELECT ddos.id orderSplitId, ddos.number number, ddos.create_date createDate, ddos.address_id addressId, ddos.house_id houseId, ddos.is_reservation_deliver isReservationDeliver, IF ( ( SELECT count(1) FROM dj_deliver_order_split_item osi LEFT JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver sp ON osi.split_deliver_id = sp.id WHERE ddos.id = osi.order_split_id AND ( sp.shipping_state IS NULL OR sp.shipping_state IN (0, 4, 6, 7)) > 0), 1, 2 ) status, ddos.apply_status applystatus FROM dj_deliver_order_split ddos WHERE ddos.apply_status IN (1, 2) AND ddos.storefront_id = #{storefrontId} AND ( ddos.address_id = #{addressId} OR ddos.house_id = #{houseId} )
